description: I've had a crush on Ricky since I first saw him in 2006. Since then, we've made lots of scenes together for Maskurbate and we've become close friends. It would take too long to tell you what I like about him. Of course he is well known for his 9 inch dick, his smooth muscular body and his charisma. His secret to keep his body in such a great shape over the years? Gym, Sports and Sex! Though I was unable to suck him in front of the camera, this guy was one of my best discoveries over the years. I'm glad he agreed to let me shoot him again unmasked. He instinctively knows how to act in front of the camera and how to tease his fans and myself. I admit it, I get hard every time I shoot with him and edit one of his scenes.
title: Gym, Sports & Sex!, Scene #01
